def P(N):

    def modPow(a, b, m):
        """Calculate (a^b) % m."""
        result = 1
        while b > 0:
            if b % 2 == 1:
                result = result * a % m
            a = a * a % m
            b = b // 2
        return result
    A = [(modPow(2, i, N + 1), i) for i in range(1, N + 1)]
    A.sort()
    inv = 1
    bit = [0] * (N + 1)
    for (_, i) in A:
        x = i
        while x > 0:
            inv += bit[x]
            x -= x & -x
        x = i
        while x <= N:
            bit[x] += 1
            x += x & -x
    return inv
